blogPost.excerpt: Baaz enables live video commerce for retailers globally. A retail store can host live videos, manage catalogs, live chats, payments, shipping, promotions and influencers from Baaz app. All things related to live video shopping in one place.
blogPost.body: Baaz enables live video commerce for retailers globally. A retail store can host live videos, manage catalogs, live chats, payments, shipping, promotions and influencers from Baaz app. All things related to live video shopping in one place.
blogPost.title: Baaz - Create virtual showroom in less than 1 min & sell online
blogPost.author: Chitresh Parihar

localize.description: Baaz为全球零售商提供现场视频商务服务。零售店可以托管实时视频，管理目录，实时聊天，支付，送货，促销和Baaz应用程序的影响力。所有与视频直播购物相关的东西都集中在一个地方。
localize.tagline: 在不到1分钟的时间内创建虚拟展厅并在线销售

localize.description: Baaz爲全球零售商提供現場視頻商務服務。零售店可以託管實時視頻，管理目錄，實時聊天，支付，送貨，促銷和Baaz應用程序的影響力。所有與視頻直播購物相關的東西都集中在一個地方。
localize.tagline: 在不到1分鐘的時間內創建虛擬展廳並在線銷售

previous.title:
Disney revenues were down 19% in 2020 and they reported a total net loss of $4.95 billion.

The stock is up 38% over the last year.

$DIS

localize.full_text:
迪士尼在2020年的收入下降了19%，他们的净亏损总额为49.5亿美元。

该股在去年上涨了38%。

$DIS

迪士尼在2020年的收入下降了19%，他們的淨虧損總額爲49.5億美元。

該股在去年上漲了38%。

$DIS

next.excerpt: On Nugget you’re the DJ of your own audio station. You can pull audio from all over the internet and add your voice to create a station about anything that interests you. You can also leave audio comments on your friends’ posts.
next.title: Nugget - Share and record audio with your friends

localize.description: 在Nugget上，你是你自己音频站的DJ。你可以从互联网上提取音频，并添加你的声音，创建一个关于任何你感兴趣的站。你还可以在你朋友的帖子上留下音频评论。
localize.tagline: 与朋友分享和录制音频

localize.description: 在Nugget上，你是你自己音頻站的DJ。你可以從互聯網上提取音頻，並添加你的聲音，創建一個關於任何你感興趣的站。你還可以在你朋友的帖子上留下音頻評論。
localize.tagline: 與朋友分享和錄製音頻
